title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: K12 Educator Capacity Development for Digital Learning Environment Transformation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of educational technology and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can develop two or more K12 digital learning environment design scenarios by applying the design thinking process.
Learners can propose three or more instructional design strategies utilizing emerging technologies such as augmented reality (AR) and virtual reality (VR).
Learners can create a digital education program evaluation checklist aligned with national educational technology standards and online teacher certification criteria.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
